meanings.definition: Worthy of being reported as news.
meanings.sent1: The newsworthy event made it to the front page of the newspaper.
meanings.sent2: The journalist always looks for newsworthy stories to cover.
meanings.sent3: The cat's newsworthy antics caught the attention of the local news station.
meanings.sent4: The newsworthy discovery sent shockwaves through the scientific community.
meanings.sent5: The newsworthy incident was unforgettable for everyone who witnessed it.

meanings.definition: Deserving of attention from the media.
meanings.sent1: The celebrity's newsworthy scandal was all over the tabloids.
meanings.sent2: The politician's speech was deemed newsworthy by the press.
meanings.sent3: The newsworthy fashion show drew in reporters from all major networks.
meanings.sent4: The newsworthy interview sparked a heated debate among viewers.
meanings.sent5: The newsworthy press conference was the talk of the town for days.
